name: Saburo Arasaka
description: Saburo Arasaka(荒坂 三郎), also known asthe Emperor, went from being an Imperial Japanese Navy Air Service Pilot to the corporate God of the 21st century. Born inTokyo,Japanhe made theArasaka Corporationinto one of the largestcorporationsof the world. Saburo is proud, honorable and, like the true Samurai Shogun he claims to be, he's power hungry. Although he is ancient and physically decrepit, Saburo Arasaka remains the genius he always was in his younger years. Despite his age, Saburo never gave up his control over Arasaka. When his eldest son,Kei, became the Chief Executive Officer of the...
